Ever wondered about why your passport is a certain colour?

Around the world, passports only come in varying shades of four colours, but the reasoning behind it is not as complicated as you think.

READ: Green visas and golden passports, escape route or the hefty price of all-access travel

If you want to see which countries have which colour, check out this handy Passport Index.

What matters though it what's on the inside - especially those handy visas for travelling around the world.
